li.label: Resonant Impact
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strikes with the power of a sonic boom, delivering blows that resonate with devastating frequency. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks shatter defenses, causing a ripple of damage that reverberates through the battlefield.

li.label: Echoing Footwork
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the speed of a reverberating soundwave, darting across the battlefield as if carried by the wind. {PAWN_pronoun}'s steps create a shockwave that confuses and disorients enemies.

li.label: Harmonic Influence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates a harmonious aura, using the resonance of sound to influence the environment. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of others with the subtle frequencies of sound, controlling emotions and behaviors with ease.

li.label: Vibrational Endurance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures with the strength of resonant vibrations, standing firm even in the face of overwhelming pressure. {PAWN_pronoun}'s spirit is as unshakable as a deep, steady bass.

li.label: Sound Barrier
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} shields themselves with sound, creating barriers of sonic energy that nullify toxins and filth. {PAWN_pronoun} vibrates at such a frequency that harmful substances cannot touch {PAWN_possessive} body.

li.label: Resonant Cooking
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} cooks with the power of sound, using vibrations to perfectly heat and cook food. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that every meal resonates with flavor, using harmonic frequencies to enhance taste.

li.label: Sonorous Command
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} speaks with the weight of a deep, resonant voice, commanding attention and loyalty with each word. {PAWN_pronoun}'s presence reverberates in the hearts of those nearby, inspiring them to follow {PAWN_pronoun} with unshakeable devotion.

li.label: Vibrational Healing
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals through sonic vibrations, resonating with the body's natural frequencies to speed up recovery. {PAWN_pronoun} soothes wounds and pain with a gentle hum that accelerates the healing process.

li.label: Resonant Harvest
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the land with harmonic frequencies, encouraging crops to grow at an accelerated rate. {PAWN_pronoun} resonates with the earth, coaxing forth bountiful harvests with minimal effort.
